modName: A Song of Ice and Fire
summary:
Welcome to the Song of Ice And Fire mod. This is mod is a total conversion of Skyrim into Westeros 
Pre Production has just begun for \"Swords In the Darkness\" which is the first release of the mod.
descriptionHtml: This Mod is a total conversion from Skyrim to Westeros. As the North very much resembles Skyrim a lot of the same assets will be used however the further south the game goes you will be more likely to see much more unique assets especially crafted for this Mod. Other game play mods may be used with in this mod however if this is so it will be with the creators permission and they will also be credited.
author: Valyrian Productions
